title: Braith Anasta cozies up to fiancée Rachael Lee in Bali
text:
Braith Anasta and Rachael Lee are on holiday in Bali, after announcing their engagement last week.

And on Sunday, the retired NRL star shared a loved-up photo with his fiancée to Instagram, while dining at a local bar and restaurant.

The 37-year-old beamed in the snap as he sat close to the personal trainer, who showed off her sparkling engagement ring from Shannakian Fine Jewellery.

'Bali with my fiancée': Braith Anasta, 37, cozied up to Rachael Lee on holiday in Indonesia, in a photo shared to Instagram on Sunday, as the couple celebrate their recent engagement

Braith cut a casual figure in a white T-shirt and shorts, and rested one hand on Rachael's arm.

The brunette looked sensational in a stretchy blue tie-dye frock, and secured her locks in a ponytail at the nape of the neck.

Rachael opted for minimal makeup, allowing her natural beauty to shine through, and rested her left hand on her cheek, drawing attention to her prized bling.

'Bali with my fiancée,' Braith captioned the photo, alongside a love heart emoji.

Celebrations: Rachael also posted the same image to her own Instagram account, writing in the caption: 'Breakfast with a view with my future hubby [sic]'

Wedding bells! On Tuesday, the pair announced their engagement, with Braith dropping to one knee to propose with their children by his side

Rachael also posted the same image to her own Instagram account, writing in the caption: 'Breakfast with a view with my future hubby [sic].'

On Tuesday, the pair announced their engagement, with Braith dropping to one knee to propose with their children by his side.

Rachael announced the news on Instagram, sharing a sweet video of the proposal, which appeared to have taken place at their home in Sydney's Eastern Suburbs.

'My amazing, love of my life and future husband and my three darling babeees [sic] surprised me w [sic] the most beautiful perfect proposal!' Rachael's post began.

He put a ring on it! Rachael announced the news on Instagram, sharing a sweet video of the proposal, which appeared to have taken place at their home in Sydney's Eastern Suburbs

'I've never been so surprised and blown away - it was pure perfection, I'm SO in love and happy!! We're getting MARRIED.'

She added: 'Braith, thank you for a perfect morning and the best surprise ever. I love you always.'

Braith - who was married to Jodi Anasta from October 2012 to December 2015 - began dating Rachael in 2016.

They share daughter Gigi, one, while Braith has daughter Aleeia, five, with ex Jodi, and Rachael Lee has an older son Addison, eight, from a previous relationship.
description: Retired NRL star Braith Anasta, 37, shared a loved-up photo with fiancée Rachael Lee to Instagram on Sunday.
authors: Chloe-Lee Longhetti For Daily Mail Australia
